title: Five-Star Portugal Vineyard Escape near Peneda-Gerês National Park
description: Create unique memories in northern Portugal at the five-star The Vinea Collection Hotel, located in a refurbished 18th-century manor house nestled among the vineyards of Alto Minho. Found on the doorstep of Peneda-Gerês National Park with sweeping mountain views from each of its 67 rooms, the hotel's onsite restaurant is sure to entice the tastebuds, while local wines and delicacies can be purchased at the hotel shop. For those keen to unwind and pamper, The Vinea Panoramic Spa awaits, offering tempting treatments.
offer_address: Quinta da Porteleira, Estr. de Senrela, 4950-030 Badim, Portugal
